property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you become engaged with an enemy: Gain 1 resource. ε effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Zoey's Cross, Smite the Wicked, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more while investigating: Discover 1 clue at your location. ε effect: +2. You may instead choose to automatically fail this skill test to draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Search for the Truth, Rex's Curse, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding requirements: No Fortune cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: You collect 1 additional resource during each upkeep phase. ε effect: +1 for each resource you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Jenny's Twin .45s, Searching for Izzie, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat the modifier on α tokens you reveal as "0." Anytime you reveal a ε token, you may choose to instead treat it as a α token. ε effect: +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Jim's Trumpet, Final Rhapsody, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: You begin the game with Duke in play. θ Discard a card from your hand: Ready an asset you control. (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +2. Ready Duke.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Duke, Wracked by Nightmares, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Zoey Samaras deck only. ι After an enemy becomes engaged with you, exhaust Zoey's Cross and spend 1 resource: Deal 1 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Attach Smite the Wicked to that enemy and spawn it at the location farthest from you. Forced – When the game ends, if attached enemy is in play: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Rex Murphy deck only. Draw X cards, where X is the number of clues on Rex Murphy (to a maximum of 5).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Rex's Curse into play in your threat area. Forced - When you would succeed at a skill test: Return the revealed chaos token to the bag and reveal a new chaos token. If this effect causes you to fail the test, shuffle Rex's Curse into your deck. (Limit once per test.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Jenny Barnes deck only. Uses (X ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach Searching for Izzie to the location farthest from you. ηη: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, discard Searching for Izzie. Forced - When the game ends, if Searching for Izzie is in play: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jim Culver deck only. ι When a α token is revealed during a skill test, exhaust Jim's Trumpet: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location or a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Reveal 5 chaos tokens from the chaos bag. For each α and ζ token revealed, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: "Ashcan" Pete deck only. η Exhaust Duke: Fight. You attack with a base ή skill of 4. This attack deals +1 damage. η Exhaust Duke: Investigate. You investigate with a base έ skill of 4. You may move to a connecting location immediately before investigating with this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Exhaust all assets you control and put Wracked by Nightmares into play in your threat area. Assets you control cannot ready. ηη: Discard Wracked by Nightmares.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. You get +1 ή for this attack. If you perform this attack against an enemy engaged with another investigator and you fail, you deal no damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Engage any number of enemies at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investigators at your location may give or trade any number of Item assets, Ally assets, or resources among one another.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Engage any number of enemies at your location. Draw 1 card for each enemy engaged in this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2 while checking your hand size during the upkeep phase. ι After Laboratory Assistant enters play: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Test έ (4). If you succeed, discard Strange Solution and draw 2 cards. Record in your Campaign Log that "you have identified the solution."

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Choose an investigator at your location. Move that investigator to a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering a clue at your location, discover a clue at a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (4 supplies). η Spend 1 supply: Choose an investigator at your location to heal 1 horror. Then, that investigator tests ά (2). If the test succeeds, he or she heals 1 additional horror. If the test fails, he or she discards 1 card at random from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when an enemy would spawn at your location. Immediately move to a connecting location. (The enemy still spawns at your previous location.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Max 1 committed per skill test. Double the difficulty of this skill test. If this skill test is successful, resolve the effects of the successful test twice.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ή. Forced – At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either pay 1 resource or discard Hired Muscle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using ά instead of έ. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol is revealed during this test, after this test resolves lose all remaining actions and immediately end your turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After a α, β, γ, or δ symbol is revealed during a test you are performing: You get +1 skill value for this test.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Spend 1 charge: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evade. This evasion attempt uses ά instead of ί. If you succeed and the enemy is non‑Elite, evade it and attach Bind Monster to it. ι When attached enemy would ready: Test ά (3). If you succeed, attached enemy does not ready. If you fail, discard Bind Monster.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. If you have no resources in your resource pool, this attack deals +1 damage. θ During an attack using Fire Axe, spend 1 resource: You get +2 ή for this skill test. (Limit three times per attack.)

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ί. ι After your turn ends: Heal 1 horror from Peter Sylvestre.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evade. If you succeed, if the enemy is non-Elite, evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ί and +1 ά. ι After your turn ends: Heal 1 horror from Peter Sylvestre.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. You get +1 ή for this attack. If you succeed, you may spend 1 additional action to deal +1 damage for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. You start each game with 2 fewer resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Place Internal Injury into play in your threat area. ι At the end of your turn: Take 1 direct damage. ηη: Discard Internal Injury.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Place Chronophobia into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn: Take 1 direct horror. ηη: Discard Chronophobia.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you draw a card, discard that card and exhaust Dr. Henry Armitage: Gain 3 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Easy / Standard α: -1. If you fail, discard the top 3 cards of your deck. β: -1 (-3 instead if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile). δ: -X. Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. X is the total printed cost of those discarded cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hard / Expert α: -2. If you fail, discard the top 5 cards of your deck. β: -1 (-5 instead if there are 10 or more cards in your discard pile). δ: -X. Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. X is the total printed cost of those discarded cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator with 5 or more cards in his or her discard pile takes 1 horror. Each investigator with 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile takes 2 horror, instead. If the players have completed The House Always Wins, advance directly to agenda 2b. If Extracurricular Activity is the first scenario in the campaign, advance to agenda 2a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator's maximum hand size is reduced by 3 while checking his or her hand size during the upkeep phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Dormitories location is not in play, put it into play. If The Experiment is in play, move it 1 location towards the Dormitories. If The Experiment is not in play, spawn it in the Science Building.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When this agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold: Instead, remove all doom in play and move The Experiment 1 location toward the Dormitories. Objective - If The Experiment enters the Dormitories, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator immediately takes 3 horror. Then, proceed to (→R4).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the set-aside "Jazz" Mulligan into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck (top 10 instead if there is only 1 player in the game). Forced - If you discard "Jazz" Mulligan for any reason, resolve his revelation effect. Objective - When you take control of "Jazz" Mulligan, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Alchemy Labs location is not in play, put it into play. If you are at Agenda 1 or 2, spawn The Experiment in the Alchemy Labs. If you have completed The House Always Wins, put the set-aside Alchemical Concoction into play underneath the Alchemy Labs. If Extracurricular Activity is the first scenario of the campaign, remove the set-aside Alchemical Concoction from the game, instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - Find and complete an objective on another encounter card.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. "We can't find Rice anywhere..." You leave the campus, hoping Armitage will forgive you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of your turn, if you are in the Humanities Building: Discard the top X cards of your deck, where X is the amount of horror on you.

property.name: Text
property.value: You must spend 1 additional action to investigate the Orne Library.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Student Union is revealed: Put the set-aside Dormitories into play. ηη: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: The door leading into the Dormitories is locked. You cannot move into the Dormitories.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - If investigators in the Dormitories spend 3[per investigator] clues, as a group: (→R2)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Administration is revealed: Put the set-aside Faculty Offices into play. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you are in Administration: Discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: The door leading into the Faculty Offices is locked. You cannot move into the Faculty Offices.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Faculty Offices is revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Humanoid enemy and spawn it here. Shuffle the encounter deck. Objective - If investigators in the Faculty Offices spend 2[per investigator] clues, as a group: (→R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: The door leading into the Faculty Offices is locked. You cannot move into the Faculty Offices.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Science Building is revealed: Put the set-aside Alchemy Labs into play. Forced - When you fail a ά test in the Science Building: Take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: The door leading into the Alchemy Labs is locked. You cannot move into the Alchemy Labs.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Investigate. If you are successful, instead of discovering clues, take the Alchemical Concoction from underneath this location if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Massive. The Experiment gets +3[per investigator] health. Forced - When the enemy phase begins: Ready The Experiment. Objective - If The Experiment is defeated, advance to act 3b.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. This attack uses έ instead of ή. If used to attack The Experiment, this attack deals +6 damage. If you succeed, remove Alchemical Concoction from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put "Jazz" Mulligan into play at your location. While "Jazz" Mulligan is not controlled by a player, he gains: "η: Parley. Test έ (3). If successful, take control of "Jazz" Mulligan." While you control "Jazz" Mulligan, you ignore the text on each unrevealed Miskatonic location.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 έ. ι After you discover the last remaining clue in your location, exhaust Professor Warren Rice: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Easy / Standard α: -2. You may spend 2 resources to treat this token as a 0, instead. β: -3. If you succeed, gain 3 resources. γ: -2. If you fail, discard 3 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hard / Expert α: -3. You may spend 3 resources to treat this token as a 0, instead. β: -3. If you fail, discard 3 resources. γ: -2. Discard 3 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Criminal enemy gains Aloof. If an investigator deals damage to a Criminal enemy: Immediately advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If the players have completed Extracurricular Activity, advance directly to agenda 2b. If The House Always Wins is the first scenario in the campaign, advance to agenda 2a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn a random enemy from the set-aside Hideous Abominations encounter set in Clover Club Lounge. Shuffle the rest of that encounter set, the set-aside Striking Fear encounter set, and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Move all investigators and unengaged enemies from La Bella Luna to the Clover Club Lounge. Remove La Bella Luna from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: Discard each Criminal enemy in the same location as an Abomination enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When you reveal a chaos token: You may treat that token as if it were any other token in the chaos bag. If you do, remember that you have "cheated." (Group limit once per round.) Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Darkened Hall into play. If it is Agenda 1, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Criminal enemy is discarded, and spawn that enemy in the Darkened Hall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - Only investigators in the VIP Area may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players have not yet completed Extracurricular Activity:You find Dr. Morgan gambling in one of the VIP rooms... but he appears to be playing cards with two unconscious bodies, his pupils dilated as though in a trance. He can't seem to stop laughing, smiling, and chatting with the other "players."Put the set-aside Dr. Morgan into play in the VIP Area. Advance to Act 3a - "All In." If the players have completed Extracurricular Activity:The VIP rooms are filled with the mangled and bloody bodies of unfortunate patrons. There doesn't appear to be any trace of Dr. Morgan. You hear screaming and gunfire from the main area of the club.Put the set-aside Peter Clover into play in the Clover Club Bar. Search the encounter deck (or out of play) for an Abomination enemy, and spawn it in the Clover Club Bar. Advance to Act 3a - "Fold."

property.name: Text
property.value: While Dr. Morgan is not controlled by a player, he gains "η: Parley. Test ά (3) to shake Dr. Morgan out of his daze. If you succeed, place 1 clue from the token bank on him. If there are 1[per investigator] clues on Dr. Morgan, take control of him." Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: — If an investigator resigned with Dr. Francis Morgan under his or her control, (→R2) — Otherwise, (→R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: While Peter Clover is not controlled by a player, he gains "η: Parley. Test ά (3) to convince Peter to follow you. If you succeed, place 1 clue from the token bank on him. If there are 1[per investigator] clues on Peter Clover, take control of him." Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: — If an investigator resigned with Peter Clover under his or her control, (→R3) — Otherwise, (→R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. This was a bust.

property.name: Text
property.value: While it is Act 1, Clover Club Lounge gains: "η Discard an Ally asset from your hand: Gain 2 clues from the token pool. (Limit once per game.)"

property.name: Text
property.value: While it is Act 1, Clover Club Bar gains: "η Spend 2 resources: Gain 2 clues from the token pool and draw 2 cards. Remember that you have 'had a drink.' (Limit once per game.)"

property.name: Text
property.value: While it is Act 1, Clover Club Cardroom gains: "η Spend 2 resources: Reveal a random chaos token. If it is a ε symbol, gain 2 clues and 2 resources from the token bank. If it is an even number, gain 2 clues from the token bank. If it is an odd number or a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol, nothing happens."

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Darkened Hall is revealed: Put into play the 3 set-aside Back Hall Doorway locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you fail a skill test while investigating the Art Gallery: Lose 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are in the VIP Area, you cannot draw cards or gain resources during the upkeep phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. We can get out this way!

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Highest έ. Hunter. Forced - After an investigator at Clover Club Pit Boss's location gains any number of clues: Clover Club Pit Boss readies, engages that investigator, and makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the start of the enemy phase, if no investigator controls Peter Clover: Deal 1 damage to him. θExhaust Peter Clover: Automatically evade a Criminal enemy in your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ή. ι After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Dr. Francis Morgan: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Surge. Revelation - Each player who has "had a drink" loses 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Place 1 doom on each Criminal enemy at your location. If no doom was placed by this effect, lose 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (5). For each point you fail by, discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Surge. Revelation - Put Beyond the Veil into play in your threat area if there is no copy of Beyond the Veil in your threat area. Forced - If your deck has no cards in it: Take 10 damage and discard Beyond the Veil.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation - You must attach Light of Aforgomon to either the current agenda or the current act. Limit 1 per agenda/act. Treat all damage as direct damage and all horror as direct horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Location with the most clues. Retaliate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Least cards in hand. Hunter. Forced - When the engaged investigator draws a Hex or Pact card: Wizard of Yog-Sothoth attacks that investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Unhallowed Country into play in your threat area. You cannot play Ally assets. Treat the printed text box of each Ally asset you control as if it were blank. Forced - At the end of your turn: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Unhallowed Country.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach Sordid and Silent to your location. Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator at attached location takes 1 horror. Forced - When the agenda advances: Discard Sordid and Silent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Hunter. Each investigator at Whippoorwill's location gets -1 ά, -1 έ, -1 ή, and -1 ί.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (2). Increase this skill test's difficulty by 1 for each damage on you. If you fail, take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Cursed Luck into play in your threat area. You get -1 skill value during skill tests. Forced - After you succeed at a skill test by 1 or more: Discard Cursed Luck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a ε symbol or positive number, nothing happens. If you reveal any other number, take 1 damage. If you reveal a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol, take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Lowest έ. Hunter. While Avian Thrall is being attacked using a Ranged, Firearm, or Spell asset, it gets -3 fight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Farthest location from you. Prey - Lowest ί. Hunter. Retaliate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If there are no Abomination enemies in play, Altered Beast gains surge. Otherwise, choose an Abomination enemy. Heal all damage from that enemy and attached Altered Beast to it. Forced - When you enter attached enemy's location (or vice-versa): Take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: While O'Bannion's Thug is engaged with you, you cannot gain resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Retaliate. Forced - After Mobster attacks you: Lose 1 resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If there are no unengaged Criminal enemies in play, Hunted Down gains surge. If there are 1 or more unengaged Criminal enemies in play, each of them moves 1 location toward you. Each Criminal enemy that engages you as a result of this effect makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Choose and shuffle a non-story asset you control into your deck and discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If a copy of that asset is discarded, take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation - Choose one of the following cardtypes (asset, event, or skill). Each player must discard each card in his or her hand that is of the chosen cardtype. If this is not the first copy of Terror from Beyond drawn this phase, choose two cardtypes instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to your location. As an additional cost to move into or out of attached location, test ά (4). If successful, discard Arcane Barrier. Otherwise, you must either cancel the effects of the move or discard the top 5 cards of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Lowest ά. Hunter. Forced - After you perform an attack against the Conglomeration of Spheres using a Melee card: Discard that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Lowest ί. Hunter. Forced - When Servant of the Lurker attacks you: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.
